name: Rotate To Find The Difference
description:
There was a moment when the "Find the difference" game idea, which was rotating without splitting the screen, appeared in my mind. I caught it.

Gameplay


  • Rotate the cube to view each group of worlds.
  • Find the difference between each group of worlds.
Game Features/h2]

  • No split screen.
  • Rotating gameplay that tests memory.
  • 10 different themed worlds.
  • Generate different objects programmatically.
  • Endless mode.
